about_the_game:
At its core, Memoria Wake's gameplay revolves around a challenging combat system that emphasizes the art of parrying. Players must hone their reflexes and master precise timing to overcome the various adversaries they'll encounter. But combat isn't the only challenge awaiting dreamers; intricate puzzles are scattered throughout the journey, testing both wit and ingenuity

With its compelling narrative and innovative gameplay, Memoria Wake invites players on an unforgettable adventure to uncover the deep mysteries of the dream world.

Who can you trust in a world built on illusions? Navigate a twisting narrative where friends and foes are not always what they seem. Every decision shapes your path through this mesmerizing dreamscape.
